sn37.14:1.1: “Anuruddha, when females have five qualities, when their body breaks up, after death, they are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
sn37.14:1.3: They kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, and consume alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.
sn37.14:1.4: When females have these five qualities, when their body breaks up, after death, they are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.”
